授業目的: この授業では研究演習I・IIで得た知識を土台にして、死生学、宗教学、と医療人類学についての知識をさらに深めることを目的とする。
到達目標: 卒業論文のテーマを完成させるための知識とスキルを身に着けることを目標とする。
授業方法: The primary language of instruction and discussion in the seminar will be English. However, we will occasionally use Japanese materials and allow Japanese discussion to understand difficult topics. In principle, the seminar will be student-led. Students will take turns reporting on the progress of their senior thesis.

トピック.授業計画1:
Session 1: Orientation
Session 2-27: Student reports on research findings and progress of senior thesis.
Session 28: Conclusion
トピック.授業外学習2:
Spring Semester: Gather relevant readings, sources, conduct fieldwork, learn writing mechanics, work on detailed outline, write introduction, literature review, and methods sections for their senior thesis.
Fall Semester: Continue gathering data and work on writing the data analysis, discussion, and concluding sections of their senior thesis.
